definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 过去的半个世纪内，美国一直是世界的面包篮子。

sentences.english: Doudou has been home half a month, how I miss him.
sentences.chinese: 豆豆回家已经半个月了，我好想他啊。

sentences.english: At most can support about half.
It took another half an hour before he limped back.
sentences.chinese: 又过了半个小时，他才一瘸一拐地回来。

sentences.english: First, I notice that you offer soup and a half-sandwich?
sentences.chinese: 第一，我发现你们这有汤和半个三明治？

sentences.english: The chairman dispatched the meeting in half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 主席在半个钟头内就把会议迅速开完。

sentences.english: It took only half an hour by taxi from Congjiang county to Basha.
sentences.chinese: 从江县城打车到岜沙，只不过半个小时车程。

sentences.english: He then went on a 30 minute speech about how he'd really like to take more pictures of his cat in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 然后他说了半个小时想在新的一年里给猫多拍点照片。
相差半个周期则引起抵消。

sentences.english: Eat half a grapefruit twice a week.
You could say that she's my female half because we're fraternal twins.
sentences.chinese: 你可以说你是我的半个女人，因为我们是龙凤胎。

sentences.english: Half an hour later she fell ill, ” the maid said.
sentences.chinese: 半个小时之后她便病倒了”女佣说。

sentences.english: Half an hour later, they met the old man whom they miss all the time.
sentences.chinese: 半个小时后，他们终于见到了日夜思念的亲人。

sentences.english: Xiang City, beginning from the Ching Ming Festival, about half the months to come.
sentences.chinese: 香市从清明节开始，约半个来月。

sentences.english: It took the boy half an hour to fix Sue's computer.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩子花了半个小时修苏的电脑。

sentences.english: They will be ready in about half an hour. Do you need anything else?
sentences.chinese: 还有半个小时才好，您还需必要别的吗？

definition: a portion smaller than a half/the lesser part/the smaller part
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
to calculate/to estimate/in total/all told/(fig.) if you think about it
